name: tapo-camera-mcp
description: Comprehensive camera management MCP server supporting Tapo, Ring, Furbo, and USB webcams with 26+ tools
long_description: Professional camera management and control platform with support for multiple camera types including TP-Link Tapo IP cameras, Ring doorbells, Furbo pet cameras, and USB webcams. Includes PTZ control, motion detection, image capture, video streaming, Grafana metrics integration, and AI-powered vision analysis using DINOv3. Features a web dashboard with live video streaming and comprehensive MCP tool suite.

prompts.name: camera-setup-guide
prompts.description: Interactive guide for setting up a new camera
prompts.text:
Let me help you set up your ${arguments.camera_type} camera. For ${arguments.camera_type} cameras, you'll need:

- Tapo: IP address, TP-Link account email and password
- Ring: Ring account credentials
- Furbo: Furbo account credentials  
- Webcam: Just the device ID (usually 0)

Use the add_camera tool with camera_type='${arguments.camera_type}' and provide the required parameters. After setup, view your camera at http://localhost:7777

prompts.name: ptz-control-guide
prompts.text:
PTZ Control Help for action: ${arguments.action}

Available PTZ tools:
- move_ptz: Move camera (up/down/left/right/zoom_in/zoom_out)
- save_ptz_preset: Save current position with a name
- recall_ptz_preset: Return to a saved position
- get_ptz_position: See current coordinates
- go_to_home_ptz: Return to default position
- stop_ptz: Stop movement

Example: move_ptz(direction='left') to pan left. Save good angles as presets for quick recall!

prompts.name: dashboard-guide
prompts.description: Guide for using the web dashboard features
prompts.text:
Web Dashboard Guide

Access the dashboard at http://localhost:7777

Features:
- Live video streaming (MJPEG for webcams, RTSP for IP cameras)
- Multi-camera grid view
- Start/stop stream controls
- Snapshot capture
- Camera status monitoring
- Real-time health indicators

For USB webcams, video plays directly in browser. For Tapo cameras, you'll get RTSP URLs to use with VLC or other media players.

PTZ controls coming soon to the dashboard!
